entry.title: #CLX_lain's original T-shirts are now on sale at the JJ store. The bonus is that it comes with customizable costume data that can also be worn on VRChat! Only 45 of each limited edition available. #CLX_lain_VR https://www.wasei.tokyo/shop-1
entry.summary: #CLX_lain's original T-shirts are now on sale at the JJ store. The bonus is that it comes with customizable costume data that can also be worn on VRChat! Only 45 of each limited edition available. #CLX_lain_VR wasei.tokyo/shop-1

entry.title: R to @wasei_jj: I use three MacBooks to spread the load. The rightmost one is dedicated to distribution (OBS), the middle one is dedicated to PCDJ (Traktor), and the left one is dedicated to monitors. The monitor at the back is a fixed-point camera image of #Cyberia_VRC.
entry.summary: I use three MacBooks to spread the load. The rightmost one is dedicated to distribution (OBS), the middle one is dedicated to PCDJ (Traktor), and the left one is dedicated to monitors. The monitor at the back is a fixed-point camera image of #Cyberia_VRC.

entry.title:
RT by @wasei_jj: CLX S2 L9! Some really fun moments today! And the new CL4 songs by JJ are really good! Can't wait for the full album!
Here is the link to the photos of everyone from Cyberia VRC: https://photos.app.goo.gl/DLzU8KbtNgLiT4ATA
#CLX_lain #CLX_lain_VR #SerialExperimentsLain #VRChat #CYBERIA_VRC
